speaker: Northern Wastes
line: The wind here has a blade’s patience—always cutting, never hurried. Snow buries old roads, but not the feeling that something is waiting beneath it.

speaker: Your Journal
line: You can take work in the wastes, or simply mark your progress.

choices.text: Take the next contract in the Northern Wastes.
Mark the Northern Wastes as your focus.

speaker: Northern Wastes
line: The cold does not approve or forbid. It only remembers.
